survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with noise management strategies in the workplace and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current noise management strategies in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current noise management strategies in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: Which of the following noise sources are most disruptive to your work? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture common noise sources.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specification.

script.question_text: Which of the following noise sources are most disruptive to your work? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: How often do you use noise-canceling headphones or other personal noise management tools at work?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to understand personal mitigation strategies.

script.question_text: How often do you use noise-canceling headphones or other personal noise management tools at work?
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: What changes would most improve noise management in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture diverse suggestions. Limit response to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text with character limit.

script.question_text: What changes would most improve noise management in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: Does your workplace provide designated quiet zones or focus areas?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to assess availability of quiet spaces.

script.question_text: Does your workplace provide designated quiet zones or focus areas?
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: How does workplace noise affect your productivity?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Use a bipolar scale to measure both positive and negative impacts.

script.question_text: How does workplace noise affect your productivity?
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: Which of the following noise management solutions would you find most beneficial? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Flexible work hours to avoid peak noise times
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to prioritize solutions. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice) with maximum of 3 selections allowed.

script.question_text: Which of the following noise management solutions would you find most beneficial? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Flexible work hours to avoid peak noise times
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: How often do you need to relocate within the office to find a quieter workspace?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Frequency scale to measure workspace relocation due to noise.

script.question_text: How often do you need to relocate within the office to find a quieter workspace?
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: Has workplace noise ever caused you to leave the office early or work from home?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Assess extreme impacts of noise on work location choices.

script.question_text: Has workplace noise ever caused you to leave the office early or work from home?
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding workplace noise management?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture any additional feedback. No character limit.
